titleStmt.title: Trade preferr'd before religion and Christ made to give place to Mammon represented in a sermon relating to the plantations : first preached at Westminster-Abbey and afterwards in divers churches in London / by Morgan Godwyn ...
titleStmt.author: Godwyn, Morgan, fl. 1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B. Took ... and for Isaac Cleave ...,
